movie_title: Can climate change affect our mental health? ⏲️ 6 Minute English
introduction: How can you protect your mental health from the impacts of climate change? Neil and Beth discuss thi

vocabulary.definition: able to get better more easily when bad things happen
vocabulary.example: Despite the challenges, the community proved to be resilient and quickly recovered after the natural disaster.

vocabulary.definition: a positive thing that comes from a negative situation
vocabulary.example: The silver lining of losing his job was that it allowed him to pursue his passion for painting.

vocabulary.definition: the very bad and long-lasting emotional effects of an event or experience
vocabulary.example: The accident left her with emotional trauma that took years to overcome.

vocabulary.definition: challenges or difficult things in life
vocabulary.example: Despite facing many hurdles, she was determined to achieve her goals.

vocabulary.definition: to become closer again, especially in a community
vocabulary.example: After the crisis, the community reknitted and supported each other like never before.

vocabulary.definition: to find something particularly interesting or impressive
vocabulary.example: I was struck by the beauty of the sunset over the ocean.
